capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I mean, who wouldn't trust the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher? He's been an integral part of the school for years, and his loyalty to the students and staff has always been unwavering.

I'm really proud to be affiliated with Hogwarts, it's an incredible school that has given me so much. I've had the privilege of working closely with some amazing people, like Professor Dumbledore and of course, my dear friend Harry Potter. Being a part of this community is truly a dream come true for me.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's character in the Harry Potter series. He's definitely a male character, and that's confirmed by J.K. Rowling herself. I'm certain of it, actually.
